thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Donald and Kim
In a wide-ranging interview with the Journal on his first year in office, President Trump said he has a positive relationship with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, suggesting he is open to diplomacy after months of escalating tensions over Pyongyang’s nuclear-weapons program. Mr. Trump, who has publicly traded barbs with Mr. Kim and vacillated from being open to diplomacy to seeing no value in it, said he was a “a very flexible person,” framing his comments as part of a broader strategy.
